HomePage.welcomeParagraph: Dive into the enchanting world of Arabic with us. Combining expert guidance, interactive modules, and cultural immersion, we make mastering Arabic an engaging and rewarding journey. Begin your linguistic adventure today.

landing.title: Unlock Your Potential with Expert Language Coaching
landing.subTitle: Master new languages through interactive courses, personalized sessions, and flexible learning schedules designed to fit your lifestyle.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer: Tailored Language Programs for Every Learner
whatWeOffer.subTitle:
Explore our wide range of courses from beginner to advanced,
group classes and self-paced recorded sessions designed to meet your language goals.
whatWeOffer.liveSessions_paragraph: Get the classroom experience without leaving your home, Our live course sessions bring the classroom to you, featuring interactive lessons led by expert instructors. Participate in real-time discussions, ask questions, and get personalized feedback to accelerate your progress. Use online classes for flexibility. Don't just learn—experience language mastery.
whatWeOffer.recordedSessions_paragraph: Unlock the freedom to learn at your own pace! Our expertly crafted recorded courses cover all levels of language learning, from beginner to advanced. Enjoy lifetime access to high-quality video lessons, downloadable resources, and practical exercises that make mastering a new language engaging and convenient. Start your language journey today, anytime, anywhere.

whyUs.title: Why Chehabi Academy?
whyUs.ctaP_a: Ready to start your language-learning journey?
whyUs.ctaP_b: today and find the perfect fit for you!
whyUs.reason1: Expert Instructors: Learn from language professionals who bring real-world teaching experience.
whyUs.reason2: Flexible Learning Options: Whether you prefer self-paced learning or live sessions, we have options that fit your lifestyle.
whyUs.reason3: Community Support: Join a community of learners where you can connect, share experiences, and grow together.
whyUs.reason4: Certification: Earn a certificate upon course completion to showcase your language skills.
whyUs.reason5: Affordable Pricing: High-quality language courses that won't break the bank.

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.ctaP_a: want to add a feedback or browse more?

about.title: About The Academy
about.paragraph: Established in 2023, Chehabi Academy was born out of a profound love for the Arabic language and a desire to bridge cultural divides. Recognizing the significance of Arabic in global communication, heritage, and arts, we embarked on a mission to offer a comprehensive learning experience that goes beyond mere vocabulary and grammar.

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.subTitle: Getting started is easy! Follow these simple steps to access our language courses and begin your learning journey today.
howItWorks.step1_description: Browse our selection of language courses to find the one that fits your goals and learning style.
howItWorks.step2_title: Step 2: Sign Up or Log In
howItWorks.step2_description: Create a free account or log in if you're already a member.Signing up allows you to access a free trial session and manage your courses.
howItWorks.step3_description: Experience our teaching methods firsthand by booking a free trial session for any live course. It's a risk-free way to see if the course meets your needs before making a commitment.
howItWorks.step4_description: Once you're ready to proceed, complete the payment securely through our online platform.
howItWorks.step5_description: Gain full access to the live course sessions and recorded materials. Engage with expert instructors, participate in interactive classes, to progress toward language mastery.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Start Your Language Learning Journey?
ctaSection.introP_a: Whether you prefer learning at your own pace or in a dynamic, interactive setting, Chehabi Academy has the perfect course for you. Don't wait to unlock your potential, Join our community of passionate language learners and skilled instructors who are dedicated to helping you succeed. Your language mastery starts here —
ctaSection.ctaP_b: for answers to commonly asked questions, or

AboutPage.title: The Soul Of Our Platform
AboutPage.paragraph1: Established in 2023, Chehabi Academy was born out a profound love for the Arabic language and a desire to bridge cultural divides. Recognizing the significance of Arabic in global communication, heritage, and arts, we embarked on a mission to offer a comprehensive learning experience that goes beyond mere vocabulary and grammar.
AboutPage.paragraph2: Our platform doesn't just teach a language; it immerses students in a world of tradition, poetry, history, and contemporary insights. With a team of dedicated professionals, all passionate about Arabic and pedagogy, we provide a blend of time-tested teaching methodologies and cutting-edge e-learning tools. At Chehabi Academy, every lesson is a step closer to becoming not just a speaker, but a true connoisseur of the Arabic language and culture.
AboutPage.founder_paragraph1: My name is Bashir Alshihabi, founder of “Chehabi Academy” and language teacher. I was born in 1984 in Damascus, Syria, and I belong to a poet family which has been concerned with literature and poetry for more than 300 years. I am also a poet and a musician. I studied Guitar and Music Theory in Damascus, Stuttgart, and Vienna.
AboutPage.founder_paragraph2: In Germany, I gave many Arabic and German language courses and translated and interpreted at different schools, universities, companies, and agencies such as:
AboutPage.courses_paragraph: At Chehabi Academy, we offer a diverse range of courses tailored to meet the needs of every learner. From personalized 1-on-1 private sessions to engaging group live courses and flexible pre-recorded sessions, we have something for everyone. Whether you are just starting your language journey or seeking to elevate your existing skills, our thoughtfully designed courses will inspire you to achieve your goals.
AboutPage.approach_paragraph: At Chehabi Academy, our teaching methodology is all about you—the student. We prioritize interactive and immersive language learning experiences that captivate your curiosity. By blending modern teaching techniques with traditional instruction, we create a dynamic environment where you not only learn to speak but also appreciate the rich cultural context of the language. Prepare to embark on a transformative journey that equips you with practical skills and cultural insights.
AboutPage.call_to_action: Are you ready to embark on your language learning adventure? Join us today and discover the joy of mastering a new language with Chehabi Academy!

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.q1: What types of courses does Chehabi Academy offer?
questions.a1: We offer two distinct learning options: recorded courses and live sessions. Recorded courses enable you to learn at your own pace through pre-recorded video lessons and resources. Live sessions provide real-time, interactive learning experiences online.
questions.q2: Are the live sessions conducted online or in-person?
questions.a2: We offer live sessions online from the comfort of your home. This format provides a high level of interaction and learning quality.
questions.a3: We specialize in Arabic language courses. Our courses cater to different levels, from complete beginners to advanced learners looking to master the language.
questions.q4: Do I get a certificate after completing a course?
questions.a4: Yes, upon successfully completing a course, you will receive a certificate that verifies your language proficiency and can be used to showcase your skills.
questions.q5: How can I enroll in a course?
questions.a5: You can browse our courses on the 'Courses' page. Once you find a course you're interested in, simply click the 'Enroll' button and follow the registration steps. You can choose to pay for the course online.
questions.q6: Can I try a course before committing to it?
questions.a6: Yes, we offer a free trial class for live sessions so you can experience our teaching methods before making a commitment. For recorded courses, you can preview some lessons for free.
questions.a7: We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards and online payment platforms like Stripe. If you have any questions regarding payment, please reach out to our support team.
questions.q8: Can I access recorded course materials after completing the course?
questions.a8: Yes, you will have lifetime access to the recorded course materials, including videos, downloadable resources, and exercises, even after you complete the course.
questions.a9: Yes, we offer a refund policy for our courses. If you’re not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a refund within a specified period. For more details, please refer to our refund policy page.

Faq.ctaP_a: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, our support team is here to help! Feel free to reach out by visiting our
Faq.ctaP_b: page, and we'll be happy to assist you.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.intro: Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to chat about the beauty of the Arabic language, we're here for you. Reach out to us through any of the methods below, and our dedicated team will get back to you as soon as possible.

TeachWithUs.title: Teach with us
TeachWithUs.subTitle: Coming Soon!
TeachWithUs.p1: We're excited to bring you the opportunity to join our academy as a teacher. Our team is currently working on creating a platform that makes teaching with us easy and rewarding.
TeachWithUs.p2_a: If you're interested in becoming part of our teaching community,
TeachWithUs.p2_b: Share your ideas, suggestions, and any questions with us to help make this experience better.
TeachWithUs.thankYou: Thank you for your interest in teaching with us!
